content: important size information depending on what you want to make i suggest a 1x1 filet crochet in a thin crochet cotton ie no 10 chain 31 + 3 to turn which will count as 1st treble uk / 1st double_crochet usa of the 1st row for the bookmark or if you want to make a scarf use whatever type of filet you prefer and use a worsted weight/ dk yarn or thicker yarn http //www nezumiworld com/crochet_101 htm 1 for filet how to read charts please note the free pdf download is for the standard 2x2 filet crochet beware depending on the yarn thickness and hook size it may turn out too big for a bookmark a wide large bookmark is handy in large knitting and crochet books but would make a bag/ cushion insert scarf pillow trim all depending on the yarn thickness and hook size 1 http //www nezumiworld com/crochet_101 htm note because i have been asked a few times a shamrock has 3 leaves and a clover has 4 leaves ie luckily four leaf clover
